c1.name: Light Fragrance Leaching
c1.descriptionRaw:
Increases the DMG dealt by <color=#FFD780FF>Fragrance Extraction</color> and her Passive Talent's Cleardew Cologne "Lingering Fragrance" by 20%. The latter requires unlocking said Passive Talent first.
Additionally, when nearby party members trigger the Burning reaction on opponents or deal <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro DMG</color> to Burning opponents, they will generate an additional <color=#FFD780FF>Scent</color>. This effect can be triggered once every 2.9s.
c1.description:
Increases the DMG dealt by Fragrance Extraction and her Passive Talent's Cleardew Cologne "Lingering Fragrance" by 20%. The latter requires unlocking said Passive Talent first.
Additionally, when nearby party members trigger the Burning reaction on opponents or deal Dendro DMG to Burning opponents, they will generate an additional Scent. This effect can be triggered once every 2.9s.

c2.name: Lakelight Top Note
c2.descriptionRaw: When <color=#FFD780FF>Fragrance Extraction</color>, <color=#FFD780FF>Aromatic Explication</color>, or Cleardew Cologne produced by the Passive Talent "Lingering Fragrance" (the last of which requires Passive Talent activation) hits opponents, those opponents' <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro RES</color> is decreased by 30% for 10s.
c2.description: When Fragrance Extraction, Aromatic Explication, or Cleardew Cologne produced by the Passive Talent "Lingering Fragrance" (the last of which requires Passive Talent activation) hits opponents, those opponents' Dendro RES is decreased by 30% for 10s.

c3.name: Exquisite Essence
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Fragrance Extraction</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Fragrance Extraction by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Lumidouce Heart Note
c4.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Aromatic Explication</color>'s duration is increased by 2s. The interval between opponents being selected as the target for Scented Dew is decreased by 0.3s.
c4.description: Aromatic Explication's duration is increased by 2s. The interval between opponents being selected as the target for Scented Dew is decreased by 0.3s.

c5.name: Puredew Aroma
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Aromatic Explication</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Aromatic Explication by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Marcotte Sillage
c6.descriptionRaw:
When using <color=#FFD780FF>Fragrance Extraction</color> or <color=#FFD780FF>Aromatic Explication</color>, Emilie will gain Abiding Fragrance for 5s.
While this is active, after Emilie uses Normal or Charged Attacks, she will generate 1 Scent, and her Normal and Charged Attack DMG will be converted into <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro DMG</color> that cannot be overridden, and the DMG dealt will be increased by 300% of Emilie's ATK.

The Abiding Fragrance effect will be removed after 4 Scents are created this way or after its duration expires. Abiding Fragrance can be triggered once every 12s.
c6.description:
When using Fragrance Extraction or Aromatic Explication, Emilie will gain Abiding Fragrance for 5s.
While this is active, after Emilie uses Normal or Charged Attacks, she will generate 1 Scent, and her Normal and Charged Attack DMG will be converted into Dendro DMG that cannot be overridden, and the DMG dealt will be increased by 300% of Emilie's ATK.

The Abiding Fragrance effect will be removed after 4 Scents are created this way or after its duration expires. Abiding Fragrance can be triggered once every 12s.
